senses.sense_definition: The Greek goddess associated with innocence, purity, and justice, often depicted holding scales.

examples.text: In ancient myths, <w>Astraea</w> was the last immortal to leave Earth as the Golden Age ended.
The poet used the return of <w>Astraea</w> as a symbol for the restoration of justice.

senses.sense_definition: A large asteroid located in the main asteroid belt, designated as 5 Astraea.

examples.text: Astronomers tracked the orbit of <w>Astraea</w> through the night sky.
The discovery of <w>Astraea</w> followed shortly after the first four asteroids were found.
